name: Taylor AI
headline: Unified Platform for Text Enrichment
description:
Taylor is the control panel for enriching unstructured text in real-time. Business leaders and developers use Taylor to label and build products around their free text without the infrastructure and maintenance overhead. 

Why Taylor? Our customers previously relied on LLMs for tagging, extracting, and enriching data. They soon hit rate limits, high latency, and accuracy issues (LLMs are optimized for generative tasks, not structured high-accuracy workflows). With Taylor, teams get access to our proprietary models purpose-built for text classification and entity extraction.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:data-labeling; industry:big-data; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Brian Kim, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder at Taylor AI. Previously at HomeLight, Niantic Labs, and Disney Strategy. Stanford School of Engineering.

founders.name: Benjamin Anderson, Founder
founders.description: Machine learning researcher and engineer interested in making AI useful for everyone.

# The Control Panel for Text Enrichment
## Taylor enables Business & Engineering teams to build mission-critical enrichments and automations on freeform text
[Get started for free](https://trytaylor.ai/</login?signup=true>)[Book a demo](https://trytaylor.ai/</contact>)
### Loved by business, product, and engineering teams

## Classify & Extract at Scale
Enrich like never before
Structure freeform text, enrich your metadata, and customize exactly to your needs
## High impact, easy to use
### Built for total control
Fast and accurate
    
Your classification and extraction models can power live workflows, products, and real-time data pipelines.
[Learn more →](https://trytaylor.ai/</product/classify>)
Easy customization
    
Use your own taxonomy, and configure confidence thresholds to get back as many labels as you need.
[Learn more →](https://trytaylor.ai/</product/classify#custom>)
Simple to integrate
    
Integrate with your database, CRM, and Slack. No need to worry about infrastructure or maintenance.
[Learn more →](https://trytaylor.ai/</docs/quickstart>)
### Drive Business Impact from Day One
#### Wrangle your most valuable asset: your unstructured text. Whether you're leading content moderation, building product features, or streamlining business operations, Taylor brings powerful machine learning to your fingertips.
Select a tabBuildTestIntegrate

The possibilities are endless. We have so much to classify and extract from.
![Job Parsing](https://trytaylor.ai/job_parsing.svg)
Create a free account or talk to us to learn more

generated_description:
**Taylor AI: Empowering Text Enrichment**

Taylor AI is a burgeoning startup established in 2023 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch S23. Located in the heart of San Francisco, the company operates with a lean team of just two employees. Their mission is to create a *Unified Platform for Text Enrichment*, acting as a control panel that streamlines the process of enriching unstructured text in real-time.

**Why Taylor?**  
Many businesses have turned to large language models (LLMs) for tasks like tagging and extracting data, only to find themselves facing limitations like rate caps, high latency, and issues with accuracy. LLMs are tailored for generative tasks, not the rigorous requirements of structured workflows that demand precision. Enter Taylor AI, which offers proprietary models specifically designed for text classification and entity extraction—providing teams with the tools they need without the burdens of infrastructure or maintenance.

**What They Do:**  
Taylor AI is all about enabling business leaders and developers to build powerful products around free text. This involves fast and accurate classification and extraction that can support live workflows and real-time data pipelines. They emphasize easy customization—clients can use their own taxonomy and set confidence thresholds tailored to their needs. Integration is smooth too, with the solution compatible with popular platforms like CRM systems and Slack.

Taylor's platform facilitates varied applications, from content moderation to product feature development, helping businesses harness the potential of their unstructured text right away. Their user-friendly design allows teams to set up and get started swiftly, making data enrichment accessible to everyone.

**Key Attributes:**
- **Foundation:** 2023
- **Location:** San Francisco, CA
- **Team Size:** 2 Employees
- **Investment:** Supported by Y Combinator, General Catalyst, and other notable investors.
- **Focus Areas:** Developer tools, SaaS, B2B, data labeling, and big data.

The company’s website offers additional resources for potential users—ranging from a [get started](https://trytaylor.ai/login?signup=true) option to comprehensive [pricing](https://trytaylor.ai/pricing) and [blog](https://trytaylor.ai/blog) content. 

In sum, if you're seeking to make sense of unstructured data with rapid and reliable tools, Taylor AI emerges as a promising ally. Their platform not only simplifies the entanglement of text but amplifies your ability to derive actionable insights from the data you already have. For more information, visit [Taylor AI](https://trytaylor.ai).
